elements.title: Australia’s electricity market rule change that will be ‘massive’ for batteries is imminent
elements.description: The change primarily concerns the introduction of Five-Minute Settlement (5MS) of wholesale electricity market prices in the NEM, replacing the 30-minute wholesale electricity spot market settlement

elements.title: Kraken Flex
elements.description: Distributed Energy Resource Management System, used to be Upside energy

elements.title: Network price controls 2021-2028 (RIIO-2)
elements.description: The RIIO-ED2 price control sets the outputs that the 14 electricity Distribution Network Operators (DNOs) need to deliver for their consumers and the associated revenues they are allowed to collect for the five-year period from 1 April 2023 to 31 March 2028. On the back of it, UKPN [published their updated business plan](https://ed2.ukpowernetworks.co.uk/), [pdf here](https://d12szrpzyf0uik.cloudfront.net/app/uploads/2021/07/UKPN-RIIO-ED2-Plan_Customers-version_Proof-2.pdf)

elements.title: Origami
elements.description: enterprise technology that enables energy companies to have a single, real-time point of truth across assets, markets and customers. Raised £20M in [June 21](https://www.origamienergy.com/news/origami-raises-20m-series-c-funding-round-led-barclays) from Barclays

elements.title: UK emissions trading scheme (ETS)
elements.description: UK emissions trading scheme (ETS) opened for the first time on Wednesday morning (19 May) with carbon price topping £50 per tonne.

elements.title: Modo Energy
elements.description: Stay on top of the energy storage market. Asset benchmarking, live data, market reports, and news. All in one place. founded and funded by ex kiwi power people

elements.title: LCP enact
elements.description: LCP Enact is a data integration, analytics and forecasting platform for the GB energy market. Here's the platform described in a sponsored [post on the energyst](https://theenergyst.com/walking-the-bsuos-tightrope/) with numbers for BSUoS charges in 2020

elements.title: Habitat Energy
elements.description: Habitat Energy provide optimisation and trading services to owners of battery storage and other flexible energy assets. We focus primarily on grid-scale assets, transmission or distribution connected, typically 10 megawatts and above that are pursuing a merchant business model, buying and selling power in the Day Ahead, Intraday and Balancing markets. Acquired by PE Quinbrook [Nov 2021](https://www.privateequitywire.co.uk/2021/11/30/309831/quinbrook-acquires-habitat-energy)

elements.title: Electricity generation charts by Ofgem
elements.description: Ofgem data portal for the energy markets in Great Britain. This portal gives direct access to all of our interactive data charts in a single location, alongside indicators we consider key to our performance monitoring.

elements.title: Kyos
elements.description: Kyos asset management and optimisation, energy market analytics

elements.title: ICE pricing and analytics
elements.description: Intercontinental Exchange builds, operates and advances global markets through information, technology and expertise. The leading pricing, analytics and market data offered through ICE Data Services support mission-critical processes across the front, middle and back offices of organizations around the world.

elements.title: EPEX spot
elements.description: EPEX SPOT is the leading exchange for the power spot markets at the heart of Europe. It covers Germany, France, United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Belgium, Austria, Switzerland and Luxembourg

elements.title: Nord Pool
elements.description: Nord Pool runs the leading power market in Europe, and we offer day-ahead and intraday markets to our customers. The day-ahead market is the main arena for trading power, and the intraday market supplements the day-ahead market and helps secure balance between supply and demand. Historical datasets are available on their website.

elements.title: National Statistics Energy Trends: UK electricity
elements.description: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

elements.title: ICIS - Energy
elements.description: global source of Independent Commodity Intelligence Services - ICIS connect data, markets and customers to create a comprehensive, trusted view of the global commodities markets, enabling smarter business decisions that optimise the world’s resources. check their [n2ex spot analysis tool](https://www.icis.com/explore/power-analytics/)
